languages.text: {n}Вас приветствует целая группа людей. Большая их часть — члены свит, приспешники, секретари, телохранители и прочие члены почетного эскорта — склоняется в глубоких поклонах и шумно приветствует вас, однако в этом волнении особенно выделяются те, кто вам уже давно и хорошо знаком. Похоже, новость о вашем скором отбытии уже успела распространиться по станции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вас приветствует целая группа людей. Большая их часть — явно члены свит, приспешники, секретари, телохранители и прочие члены почетного эскорта — склоняется в глубоких поклонах и шумно приветствует вас, однако в этом волнении особенно выделяются те, кто вам уже давно и хорошо знаком.{/n}

languages.text: {n}An entire group of people salutes you. Most of them — an escort of honour consisting of members of retinues, associates, secretaries, bodyguards, and assorted others — bow deeply to you and shout their greetings, making a lot of noise. It appears the news of your impending departure has already spread throughout the station.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вас приветствует целая группа людей. Большая их часть — члены свит, приспешники, секретари, телохранители и прочие члены почетного эскорта — склоняется в глубоких поклонах и шумно приветствует вас, однако в этом волнении особенно выделяются те, кто вам уже давно и хорошо знаком. Похоже, новость о вашем скором отбытии уже успела распространиться по станции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}An entire group of people salutes you — an escort of honour consisting of members of retinues, associates, secretaries, bodyguards, and assorted others. Most of them bow deeply to you and shout their greetings, making a lot of noise. However, people you've known well for a long time stand out among all the commotion. It appears the news of your impending departure has already spread throughout the station.{/n}

It appears the news of your impending departure has already spread throughout the station.{/n}

{n}An entire group of people salutes you. Most of them — an escort of honour consisting of members of retinues, associates, secretaries, bodyguards, and assorted others — bow deeply to you and shout their greetings, making a lot of noise. It appears the news of your impending departure has already spread throughout the station.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一大群人向你致敬。这支仪仗队由各种各样的人组成，包括随从、助手、秘书、保镖与其他人员，绝大多数人都在向你深深鞠躬，高声致意，发出阵阵呼喊。看来，你即将离开落脚港的消息，已经传遍了整座星站。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An entire group of people salutes you. Most of them — an escort of honour consisting of members of retinues, associates, secretaries, bodyguards, and assorted others — bow deeply to you and shout their greetings, making a lot of noise. It appears the news of your impending departure has already spread throughout the station.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一大群人向你致敬。这支仪仗队由各种各样的人组成，包括随从、助手、秘书、保镖与其他人员，绝大多数人都在向你深深鞠躬，高声致意，发出阵阵呼喊。看来，你即将离开落脚港的消息，已经传遍了整座星站。{/n}

languages.text: {n}大勢の人々があなたに敬礼する。そのほとんどが供人たちや従者、仲間、秘書、ボディーガードといった者たちだった。彼らはあなたに深く頭を下げ、挨拶をし、大きな声で叫んでいた。あなたの出発の速報は、既にステーション全体に広がっているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An entire group of people salutes you. Most of them — an escort of honour consisting of members of retinues, associates, secretaries, bodyguards, and assorted others — bow deeply to you and shout their greetings, making a lot of noise. It appears the news of your impending departure has already spread throughout the station.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}大勢の人々があなたに敬礼する。そのほとんどが供人たちや従者、仲間、秘書、ボディーガードといった者たちだった。彼らはあなたに深く頭を下げ、挨拶をし、大きな声で叫んでいた。あなたの出発の速報は、既にステーション全体に広がっているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te saluda todo un grupo de personas. La mayoría de ellos toda una escolta de honor compuesta por miembros de comitivas, asociados, secretarios, guardaespaldas y otros varios, que se inclinan ante ti en señal de reverencia y gritan sus saludos haciendo mucho ruido. Parece que la noticia de tu partida inminente ya se ha extendido por toda la estación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An entire group of people salutes you. Most of them — an escort of honour consisting of members of retinues, associates, secretaries, bodyguards, and assorted others — bow deeply to you and shout their greetings, making a lot of noise. It appears the news of your impending departure has already spread throughout the station.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te saluda todo un grupo de personas. La mayoría de ellos toda una escolta de honor compuesta por miembros de comitivas, asociados, secretarios, guardaespaldas y otros varios, que se inclinan ante ti en señal de reverencia y gritan sus saludos haciendo mucho ruido. Parece que la noticia de tu partida inminente ya se ha extendido por toda la estación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine ganze Gruppe von Leuten grüßt dich. Die meisten davon — eine Ehreneskorte bestehend aus Gefolgemitgliedern, Verbündeten, Sekretären, Leibwächtern und verschiedenen anderen — verneigen sich tief vor dir und rufen dir ihre Grüße zu. Es ist laut. Die Nachricht deiner bevorstehenden Abreise hat sich offenbar auf der Station verbreitet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An entire group of people salutes you. Most of them — an escort of honour consisting of members of retinues, associates, secretaries, bodyguards, and assorted others — bow deeply to you and shout their greetings, making a lot of noise. It appears the news of your impending departure has already spread throughout the station.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine ganze Gruppe von Leuten grüßt dich. Die meisten davon — eine Ehreneskorte bestehend aus Gefolgemitgliedern, Verbündeten, Sekretären, Leibwächtern und verschiedenen anderen — verneigen sich tief vor dir und rufen dir ihre Grüße zu. Es ist laut. Die Nachricht deiner bevorstehenden Abreise hat sich offenbar auf der Station verbreitet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une escorte d'honneur vous attend, composée entre autres de membres de différents entourages, d'associés, de secrétaires et de gardes du corps. La plupart d'entre eux s'inclinent respectueusement et tous se mettent à parler en même temps pour vous saluer. Il semblerait que la nouvelle de votre départ ait déjà fait le tour de la station.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An entire group of people salutes you. Most of them — an escort of honour consisting of members of retinues, associates, secretaries, bodyguards, and assorted others — bow deeply to you and shout their greetings, making a lot of noise. It appears the news of your impending departure has already spread throughout the station.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une escorte d'honneur vous attend, composée entre autres de membres de différents entourages, d'associés, de secrétaires et de gardes du corps. La plupart d'entre eux s'inclinent respectueusement et tous se mettent à parler en même temps pour vous saluer. Il semblerait que la nouvelle de votre départ ait déjà fait le tour de la station.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Büyük bir insan topluluğu seni selamlıyor. Maiyet mensuplarından, iş ortaklarından, yazmanlardan, korumalardan ve muhtelif başka kişilerden oluşan tören kıtasındaki çoğu kişi; karşında yerlere kadar eğiliyor ve yüksek sesle iyi dileklerini dile getiriyor, büyük bir gürültü koparıyor. Ayrılmak üzere oluşuna dair haberler, şimdiden tüm istasyona yayılmış gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An entire group of people salutes you. Most of them — an escort of honour consisting of members of retinues, associates, secretaries, bodyguards, and assorted others — bow deeply to you and shout their greetings, making a lot of noise. It appears the news of your impending departure has already spread throughout the station.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Büyük bir insan topluluğu seni selamlıyor. Maiyet üyelerinden, iş ortaklarından, yazmanlardan, korumalardan ve muhtelif başka kişilerden oluşan tören kıtasındaki çoğu kişi karşında yerlere kadar eğiliyor ve yüksek sesle iyi dileklerini dile getiriyor, büyük bir gürültü koparıyor. Ayrılmak üzere oluşuna dair haberler tüm istasyona şimdiden yayılmış gibi görünüyor.{/n}
